title: Commission Directive 88/483/EEC of 14 July 1988 amending the Annexes to Council Directive 70/524/EEC concerning additives in feedingstuffs
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 14 July 1988
amending the Annexes to Council Directive 70/524/EEC concerning additives in feedingstuffs
(88/483/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annexes to Directive 70/524/EEC are hereby amended as set out in the Annex hereto.

Member States shall, by 30 June 1989 at the latest, bring into force the laws, regulations or administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 July 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 270, 14. 12. 1970, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 101, 20. 4. 1988, p. 30.
(3) OJ No L 245, 12. 9. 1985, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 52, 24. 2. 1977, p. 19.
(5) OJ No L 58, 3. 3. 1977, p. 16.
(6) OJ No L 28, 1. 2. 1988, p. 1.
(7) OJ No L 133, 23. 5. 1987, p. 15.
